mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: G
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: This classification rating indicates that the movie is suitable for viewing by persons of all ages.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: PG
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: This rating is applicable where the themes or content of the film may not, in the opinion of the Board, be suitable for all children therefore parental guidance is advised.

A film is to be classified “12” where in the opinion of the Board, the theme or content of the film, is suitable for persons 12 years and over. Also, no one younger than 12 may rent or buy a “12” rated film.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: 12A
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: No one younger than 12 years old may see a “12A” movie in a cinema unless accompanied by an adult. It is an offence to exhibit a “12A” film to a person younger than 12, unaccompanied by an adult.

mdcr:Explanation.div: Note that the requirements are not met if the adult buys a ticket, but does not accompany the child in the cinema for the duration of the film.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: A film is to be classified “15” where the film, in the opinion of the Board is suitable only for persons, 15 years and above.

mdcr:Explanation.div: No one younger than 15 may see a “15” film in a cinema or rent or buy a “15” rated video. It is an offence to exhibit a “15” film to a person younger than 15.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: A film is to be classified 18 where in the opinion of the Board, it is suitable for viewing by persons 18 years and above, because the film may contain explicit violence, frequent coarse language, horror and simulated sexual scenes.

mdcr:Explanation.div: It is an offence to exhibit a “18” film to a person younger than 18.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: RE
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: A film is to be classified “RE” where in the opinion of the Board, it is not suitable for persons under 18 and it is exhibited wholly in specially licensed premises for a specialized audience. The film may contain frequent use of disturbing content.
